column4: i installed ubuntu dual boot next to win 7. before installing i moved windows loader and win partition to end of disk (to the right) with Gparted. Now ubuntu is installed windows loader doesnt work.. what to do?
need to boot the windows dvd and run repair.
then you`ll need to reinstall grub
if it doesnt offer to autorepair, then sometihng like bootsect /nt60 C:\ /mbr
